item.title: Fine-grained authorization with Amazon Cognito user pool and API Gateway
item.author: sec.gary@gmail.com (GaryZhu)
item.description: Shifting from monolith architecture to microservices are full of challenges where one primary is how to manage security and access control properly. As each microservice is running indenpendly and communicates with each other to perform a specific function, we need to authenticate the incoming request to ensures that it comes from a legitimate service.

item.title: Chat the Ops up
item.author: sec.gary@gmail.com (GaryZhu)
item.description: TL;DR This is the story of how we improved our CI/CD methodology by using Bamboo-on-Teams, a serverless ChatOps tool for interacting with Atlassian Bamboo from Microsoft Teams.
